member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the scaling capabilities of the video scaler.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: All possible output size width/height combinations that exist between the maximum size and minimum size for the extent, inclusive, are supported.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAG_POW2_ONLY
member.summary: The scaler only supports output sizes at a power of two scale factors within the range. The x and y scale factors must be the same for both dimensions when this flag is set.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT_FLAG_EVEN_DIMENSIONS_ONLY
member.summary: The scaler only supports output sizes with even output dimensions.
